 ACCEPT ^http://www.xxx.com/news/news\d+.html.+$

t is changes in "Preselector#decide-rules" and "scope rules".

I know now,
=
  - "Preselector#decide-rules" is rules for "work this Preselector"
  - "Pr=
eselector#decide-rules" is not rules for "block URLs go to
fetch processes"=


then,
  - I need to set block-all=3Dtrue. (or add new Preselector and set=

block-all true)
  - And add these rules changed ACCEPT to REJECT, REJECT t=
o ACCEPT.
if rule results ACCEPT, "BLOCK-ALL-Preselector" is run, and skip =
fetch process.

takeru
